story.title: Lookup a station status, street and landmarks

narrative.inOrderTo: know a station street, landmarks and status

scenario.title: Looking up for the street and nearby landmarks of a given station
scenario.step: Given I want to know the street of Hoxton station and nearby landmarks
When I insert the station name as the query in API
Then I should get Fanshaw Street inside Json object response

scenario.title: Looking for a station status and occupancy
scenario.step: Given I want to know the state of BikePoints_19 and its occupancy
When I request API for the state of BikePoints_19
Then I should get station status and its occupancy
